quest.intro.subtitle: Beginners Guide to Modded Minecraft
quest.intro.hotkeys.title: Useful Hotkeys
quest.intro.hotkeys.subtitle: The numbers... what do they mean?!
quest.intro.hotkeys.description_1: Below is a list of hotkeys you might find useful while playing.
quest.intro.hotkeys.description_2: Feel free to rebind them in the controls menu!
quest.intro.hotkeys.description_3:
§6F6:§r Advancements
§6F7:§r Quest Book
§6F8:§r NPC Quest Log
§6F9:§r Voice Chat Menu
§6F10:§r Skill Tree

§6H:§r Inspect your body limbs health.
§6G:§r Change your gun’s fire mode.
§6B:§r Open Backpack
§6F:§r When holding a gun, interact as though using right click. When using the item scrapper table, place item on table.
§6Z:§r Open your gun’s attachment window.
§6I:§r Open Car and Plane Inventory.
§6X:§r Start Car Engine.
§6R:§rWhen holding a gun, reload. When holding a melee weapon, throw weapon.
§6V:§r Melee if gun has a melee weapon.
§6C:§r Crawl/Slide.
§6N:§r Inspect Gun, open night vision.
§6M:§r Open world map.
§6Down Arrow:§r Throttle down simple planes.
§6Up Arrow:§r Throttle up simple planes.
§6\:§r Open world map settings.
§6Alt+P:§r Parcool Settings
